issue.title: [C++] Speed up bitsetting in ArrayBuilder::UnsafeSetNotNull
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-607](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-607). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see, e.g. https://github.com/pcmoritz/arrow/pull/3

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-607?focusedCommentId=15903668) by Robert Nishihara (robertnishihara):*
I believe this is already done in ARROW-553 https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/ad0157547a4f5e6e51fa2f712c2ed9477489a20c.

We cherry-picked the some components of ARROW-553 in our fork because we're pretty far behind the Arrow master at the moment.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-607?focusedCommentId=15906812) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Thanks, you're right
